sentences.en: a gin and tonic with ice and lemon
sentences.cn: 一杯加冰和柠檬的杜松子补酒

sentences.en: A lemon is an acid fruit.
sentences.cn: 柠檬是一种酸味水果。

sentences.en: a lemon meringue pie
sentences.cn: 柠檬蛋糖馅饼

sentences.en: A ripe lemon is yellow.
sentences.cn: 熟了的柠檬是黄色的.

sentences.en: a slice of lemon
sentences.cn: 一片柠檬

sentences.en: Add a few drops of lemon juice.
sentences.cn: 加几滴柠檬汁。

sentences.en: Add a splash of lemon juice to flavor the butter.
sentences.cn: 加上一点柠檬汁给黄油调味。

sentences.en: Add in the lemon after mixing the flour and sugar.
sentences.cn: 在面粉和糖混合之后倒入柠檬汁。

sentences.en: Blend in the lemon extract, lemon peel and walnuts.
sentences.cn: 调入柠檬汁、柠檬皮和核桃。

sentences.en: Boil the chick peas, add garlic and lemon juice.
sentences.cn: 把鹰嘴豆放在开水中煮，并加入大蒜和柠檬汁。

sentences.en: First, pare the rind from the lemon.
sentences.cn: 首先把柠檬皮剥掉。

sentences.en: His favourite tipple was rum and lemon.
sentences.cn: 他最爱喝的饮料是朗姆酒加柠檬汁。

sentences.en: I just stood there like a lemon.
sentences.cn: 我就傻乎乎地站在那儿。

sentences.en: Lemon and lime juice were both temporarily out of stock.
sentences.cn: 柠檬汁和酸橙汁暂时都缺货。

sentences.en: Lemon juice can help to prevent economy-class syndrome by improving blood circulation.
sentences.cn: 柠檬汁能够改善血液循环，有助于预防经济舱综合征。

sentences.en: McGuire took a long swig from his bottle of bitter lemon.
sentences.cn: 麦圭尔举起瓶子咕咚咕咚地喝了一大通苦柠檬汁。

sentences.en: Or get together the eggs and lemon juice and make them, but you get the idea.
sentences.cn: （就像将鸡蛋和柠檬原汁混合在一起并制作它们，但您得有想法）。

sentences.en: Sprinkle the avocado slices with lemon juice.
sentences.cn: 将柠檬汁洒在鳄梨片上.

sentences.en: There were two lemon trees and I paused to enjoy their perfume.
sentences.cn: 那里有两棵柠檬树，我不禁驻足品味柠檬的芬芳。

sentences.en: Try using lemon juice to remove tobacco stains from your fingers.
sentences.cn: 试试用柠檬汁去除手指上的烟渍。

words.tran_cn: 柠檬色的,柠檬香的,柠檬味的,柠檬制的

trans.tran_en: a fruit with a hard yellow skin and sour juice
